matchInfo.title: Match Information
matchInfo.aboutDesc: The Indian Premier League (IPL) is a professional Twenty20 cricket league in India. This match features {{team1}} taking on {{team2}} at {{venue}}.
matchInfo.venueDesc: {{venue}} is one of the most iconic cricket stadiums in India. It has a seating capacity of over 68,000 and has hosted numerous international matches.

importantPoints.gates: Gates open 2 hours before the match
importantPoints.id: Carry a valid ID proof for verification
importantPoints.food: Outside food and beverages are not allowed
importantPoints.parking: Parking is available at the venue (charges apply)

refundPolicy.question: What is the refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: Tickets are non-refundable once purchased. However, in case of match cancellation, a full refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.

transfer.question: Can I transfer my ticket to someone else?
transfer.answer: Yes, you can transfer your ticket to another person up to 24 hours before the match. The transfer can be done through the app or website.

bring.question: What should I bring to the match?
bring.answer: Please bring your ticket (digital or printed), a valid ID proof, and any necessary items like sunglasses, hat, or rain gear depending on the weather.
